description:
Kei`ichiro goes hunting for girls in town, but ends up in a fight with a traveling samurai.  The samurai, who he thought was a man, was actually a woman in men`s clothes. Otomi saves this woman, Hyougo Asai, when she collapses from hunger, and puts her to work with Kei`ichiro at the bathhouse.  But she has something she`s after...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Susanoo Hijacked! The Vicious Asai Hyogo!
Vol de Susanoo; la sévère Hyôgo Asai !
スサノオ強奪, 苛烈なる浅井兵庫!
